tables.name: attribute
tables.description: Lookup table describing attributes associated with localized titles, such as alternative titles, original titles, or other naming qualifiers.

columns.name: attribute_id
columns.description: Primary key identifying a title attribute

columns.name: attribute_name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the title attribute

tables.name: genre
tables.description: Lookup table containing all possible genres that can be associated with IMDb titles.

columns.name: genre_id
columns.description: Primary key identifying a genre

columns.name: genre_name
columns.description: Name of the genre (e.g. Drama, Comedy, Action)

tables.name: genre_title
tables.description: Bridge table mapping titles to genres. A title can belong to multiple genres.

columns.name: genre_id
columns.description: Foreign key to genre

columns.name: title_id
columns.description: Foreign key to title

tables.name: person
tables.description: Master table containing people involved in titles, such as actors, directors, writers, and other crew members.

columns.name: person_id
columns.description: Primary key identifying a person

columns.name: name
columns.description: Full name of the person

columns.name: birth_year
columns.description: Year the person was born

columns.name: death_year
columns.description: Year the person died, if applicable

tables.name: role
tables.description: Lookup table defining high-level roles a person can have in relation to a title (e.g. Actor, Director).

columns.name: role_id
columns.description: Primary key identifying a role

columns.name: role_name
columns.description: Name of the role

tables.name: role_person
tables.description: Bridge table mapping people to roles they can perform, independent of a specific title.

columns.name: role_id
columns.description: Foreign key to role

columns.name: person_id
columns.description: Foreign key to person

columns.name: job
columns.description: Specific job description associated with the role

tables.name: title_type
tables.description: Lookup table defining the type of a title, such as movie, TV series, episode, or short.

columns.name: title_type_id
columns.description: Primary key identifying a title type

columns.name: title_type_name
columns.description: Name of the title type

tables.name: title
tables.description: Core table representing IMDb titles such as movies, TV series, and episodes.

columns.name: title_id
columns.description: Primary key identifying a title

columns.name: title_type_id
columns.description: Foreign key indicating the type of title

columns.name: primary_title
columns.description: Main display title used by IMDb

columns.name: original_title
columns.description: Original title in the language of production

columns.name: is_adult
columns.description: Indicates whether the title is intended for adults

columns.name: release_year
columns.description: Year the title was first released

columns.name: duration_minutes
columns.description: Runtime of the title in minutes

columns.name: average_rating
columns.description: Average IMDb user rating for the title

columns.name: number_of_votes
columns.description: Number of user votes contributing to the average rating

tables.name: title_episode
tables.description: Table representing episodic relationships between titles, linking episodes to their parent TV series.

columns.name: episode_title_id
columns.description: Foreign key to the episode title

columns.name: series_title_id
columns.description: Foreign key to the TV series title

columns.name: season_number
columns.description: Season number of the episode

columns.name: episode_number
columns.description: Episode number within the season

tables.name: title_localized
tables.description: Table containing localized versions of titles by region and language, including alternative and original titles.

columns.name: title_id
columns.description: Foreign key to the title

columns.name: title
columns.description: Localized title text

columns.name: ordering
columns.description: Ordering index when multiple localized titles exist

columns.name: region_id
columns.description: Region where the localized title is used

columns.name: language_id
columns.description: Language of the localized title

columns.name: attribute_id
columns.description: Attribute describing the type of localized title

columns.name: is_original_title
columns.description: Indicates whether this is the original title for the region/language

tables.name: title_person_role
tables.description: Fact table linking titles, people, and roles, describing who did what on each title.

columns.name: title_id
columns.description: Foreign key to the title

columns.name: person_id
columns.description: Foreign key to the person

columns.name: role_id
columns.description: Foreign key to the role

columns.name: job
columns.description: Specific job performed by the person on the title

columns.name: number_of_roles
columns.description: Number of distinct roles performed by the person in the title

columns.name: characters
columns.description: Character names portrayed by the person, if applicable

tables.name: languages
tables.description: Reference table of supported language codes.

columns.name: language_id
columns.description: Stable surrogate key for the language

columns.name: language_code
columns.description: ISO 639 language code

columns.name: iso_standard
columns.description: ISO standard or classification for the language code

columns.name: language_name
columns.description: English display name of the language

columns.name: notes
columns.description: Additional context such as macrolanguage, historical usage, or private-use notes

tables.name: regions
tables.description: Reference table of regions and countries based on ISO 3166-1.

columns.name: region_id
columns.description: Surrogate identifier for the region

columns.name: region_code
columns.description: Region or country code as received from source systems

columns.name: iso_standard
columns.description: Classification of the region code standard

columns.name: region_name
columns.description: Canonical English name of the region or country

columns.name: notes
columns.description: Optional contextual notes describing historical status, political changes, or source-specific meaning
